title: Stupid Cupid
description: Life comes at you when you least expect itâ€¦Katie Belle Wilson is a single mom. At twenty-six, she's busting her hump to get her master's in Early Childhood Education. Her pet project, Cupid Is Calling was supposed to help her study people and how letter writing could connect them. Little did she know she was to become a participant and perhaps find the one thing she's always craved but never gained... Love.What if a driven single mom lets a sweet and caring widower into her world? Rest assured it's nothing short of Bee-u-tiful.
author: J. Haney
